title: `bytesize` property reports by `GitRepo.get_content_info()` confusing
body:
Forked from https://github.com/datalad/datalad/issues/3725#issuecomment-535520362

`bytesize` property reports by `GitRepo.get_content_info()` (and through its also from `status()` and `diff()` are confusing.

```
(datalad3-dev) mih@meiner /tmp/datalad_temp_test_path_diffrhab1czt (git)-[master] % datalad -f json_pp status subdir/annexed_file.txt
{
  "action": "status",
  "bytesize": 119,
  "gitshasum": "a79f797e1ce00f414131f7e84f47049c4c5c5f1a",
  "parentds": "/tmp/datalad_temp_test_path_diffrhab1czt",
  "path": "/tmp/datalad_temp_test_path_diffrhab1czt/subdir/annexed_file.txt",
  "prev_gitshasum": "a79f797e1ce00f414131f7e84f47049c4c5c5f1a",
  "refds": "/tmp/datalad_temp_test_path_diffrhab1czt",
  "state": "clean",
  "status": "ok",
  "type": "file"
}
(datalad3-dev) mih@meiner /tmp/datalad_temp_test_path_diffrhab1czt (git)-[master] % datalad -f json_pp status subdir/annexed_file.txt --annex
{
  "action": "status",
  "backend": "MD5E",
  "bytesize": 5,
  "gitshasum": "a79f797e1ce00f414131f7e84f47049c4c5c5f1a",
  "hashdirlower": "f33/94b/",
  "hashdirmixed": "7p/gp/",
  "humansize": "5 B",
  "key": "MD5E-s5--275876e34cf609db118f3d84b799a790.txt",
  "keyname": "275876e34cf609db118f3d84b799a790.txt",
  "mtime": "unknown",
  "parentds": "/tmp/datalad_temp_test_path_diffrhab1czt",
  "path": "/tmp/datalad_temp_test_path_diffrhab1czt/subdir/annexed_file.txt",
  "prev_gitshasum": "a79f797e1ce00f414131f7e84f47049c4c5c5f1a",
  "refds": "/tmp/datalad_temp_test_path_diffrhab1czt",
  "state": "clean",
  "status": "ok",
  "type": "file"
}
% cat /tmp/datalad_temp_test_path_diffrhab1czt/subdir/annexed_file.txt
dummy%                                                                                       
```

What about not replacing the `bytesize` report from git with that from annex (if there is any), but instead have `gitbytesize` and `annexbytesize` separately?
